评论详情: Perfect for chilly days or nights.
These PJs were for my daughter and not expensive. Nothing like her JCrew pajamas but ok for the money.
Pattern and material is good. Size is true.
I don’t know if this was my fault or not but they ripped in two weeks of having them. Don’t like the fabric either
My pre-teen LOVES these. They aren’t very heavy, but she swears by how comfortable they are. I think she’d wear them every day if we’d let her.
Omggg I love these and how comfy they are I wear them to sleep or to the movies! In love with these pjs!
Looks great and feels good enough to sleep in
Ordered a large for oversized look. Waistband is small, feels like a small on top and medium legs. Cheap material as well, but it will do for the occasion I ordered for.

Ordered these for my 11 year old granddaughter, she is tall for her age, ordered her a size small I believe, and she is obsessed with them. They're not a flannel feel on the outside, more of a rough cotton feel but flannel on the inside. She loves them and wears them all the time
A little snug, but comfy otherwise. Soft
Cute pajama pants that I got for my 12 yr old and she loves them and they look cute on her. Fit true to size and are comfortable. She wears them out of the house too.
Gift for granddaughter she loved them
